snippet: After winning the New York primary without any television advertising, Donald J. Trump is spending close to $2 million on ads in Pennsylvania alone, according to media buyers.
abstract: After winning the New York primary without any television advertising, Donald J. Trump is spending close to $2 million on ads in Pennsylvania alone, according to media buyers.

byline.original: By NICK CORASANITI and MAGGIE HABERMAN

headline.main: Donald Trump Opens $2 Million Ad Campaign in Pennsylvania
